job_overview:
Full-Time SEO Blog Writer (Remote)
InjectCo â€“ Premier Medspa | Remote | Full-Time

InjectCo is a fast-growing, modern medspa focused on aesthetics, skin health, and confidence. We are seeking a skilled and creative SEO Blog Writer to produce engaging, research-driven, and optimized content that drives traffic, boost user engagement, and supports our overall SEO strategy. 
In this role, you will write high-quality blog posts tailored to specific target audiences while incorporating SEO best practices to improve content discoverability. You will collaborate with our SEO specialists and subject matter experts to ensure that the content aligns with business objectives and resonates with readers.
Key Responsibilities:
Write well-researched, original, and compelling blog posts that reflect the brand's tone and voice.
Implement SEO best practices, including keyword integration, metadata optimization, internal linking, and formatting for readability.
Conduct thorough research to ensure the accuracy, depth, and credibility of content.
Work closely with our SEO specialists to align blog content with broader content marketing and SEO goals.
Edit and proofread content to ensure clarity, grammatical accuracy, and adherence to brand guidelines.
Requirements:
2+ years of agency experience writing SEO-optimized content
Experience with B2B, B2C or niche industries (e.g., beauty, healthcare, travel)
Strong understanding of SEO principles, including keyword research, on-page optimization, and content structuring for search engines.
Ability to simplify complex topics and present information in a clear, engaging manner.
Excellent command of grammar, spelling, and punctuation, with strong attention to detail.
Experience working with content management systems (CMS), such as WordPress, to format and publish blog posts.
Strong organizational and time-management skills to handle multiple projects and meet deadlines.
What We Offer: 
Full-time remote position (40 hours/week)
Flexible work hours
Competitive pay (based on experience)
Opportunity to grow in a fast-moving work environment
Creative freedom and ownership of your role
Supportive, fun, and collaborative team culture
$1000 / month salary 
How to Apply:
Send your resume to Upgrade to see actual info with a cover letter, including:

A writing portfolio showcasing your best work
Add the key phrase "I can write SEO content" in your email subject line
Information about any relevant experience in the medspa, beauty, or health niche

**Must be willing to a writing test as part of the application process
**Hiring 1 candidate for this role.
